post:
[SIZE=10.5pt]EnveraHost's VPS's provide an affordable way to have your very own virtual server. Our aim is to provide affordable virtual services for customers in search of good value for their money. We are targeting the premium market at budget prices.  Each VPS is running OpenVZ guaranteeing maximum performance. You also get full self management of your VPS via our SolusVM panel, you can perform your own OS reinstalls, shut-downs, reboots and so much more! On top of that, EnveraHost enforces a no overselling policy, so what you pay for is yours.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=10.5pt]Visit for more: https://www.enverahost.com/vps.html[/SIZE]

Data center: Las Vegas City, USA

[SIZE=10.5pt]Feature List: Weekly backups, 100% pure premium SSD arrays (no caching!), SolusVM, large OS library updated monthly, $1.99 dedicated IP’s, managed services, 50Mbps dedicated speed (On 1gbps port) and more![/SIZE]

[SIZE=10.5pt]We have an expansive library of OS distributions available for 1 click install: CentOS, Fedora, Ubuntu, Debian, Arch Linux, CloudLinux, Slackware and more![/SIZE]

[SIZE=10.5pt]50% off your VPS order: WHTVPS[/SIZE]
